Title: Burked
Plot: Grissom and the crew are called in after a high roller, a known drug addict, is found dead in his house by a gardener. The investigation reveals that the victim was restrained at some point with duct tape, and was possibly forced to ingest lethal amounts of heroin and other drugs.
GuestStars: Richard Ethan Courtney, Brenda Bakke, Fredric Lehne, Sheeri Rappaport, Joseph Will, Jeff Ricketts, Hilary Crouse, Tony Genaro, Missy Crider
